short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide FB comments you don't like.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can hide comments on Facebook you don't like,
and makes your Facebook returning clean.

This is a beta version,
please wait for database become complete,
or join us!

可隱藏部分已被舉報的FB帳號留言，
還給你乾淨的FB版面。
測試版！目前資料庫內的帳號不多，
請耐心等待資料庫健全，
或加入抓蝗蟲行列！
